description: Fennel is a great addition to veggie soups as it adds a lovely aniseed flavour.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Zucchini,Seafood free,Wheat free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato
name: Zucchini & Fennel Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5L vegetable stock, made with 2 stock cubes, hot

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the butter in a large, deep pan on medium heat and cook the onion for 5 minutes. Add the fennel, zucchini, potato and garlic and cook for 5 minutes, stirring, to soften.
Pour over the stock, bring to the boil and reduce the heat. Simmer for 15-20 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Remove from the heat and blitz until smooth with a hand blender. Stir in the cream and serve in bowls with parmesan sprinkled on top.
